summary: It has been ten years since the paths of René and François separated. From the glorious days when as cops they roamed the Montmartre district, they only have a handful of memories.
cast: Philippe Noiret|Thierry Lhermitte|Lorànt Deutsch|Chloé Flipo|Jean-Luc Bideau|Bernadette Lafont|Jean-François Balmer|Laurence Boccolini|Reinaldo Wong|Xing Xing Cheng|René Morard|Jean-Louis Foulquier|Hans Meyer|Gérard Van Der Gucht|Abdel Soufi|Raoul Billerey|Gérard Dubouche|Marc Samuel|Julien Drach|Ken Chung|Stefan Nelet|Jean-Denis Lefevre|Tony Librizzi|Bounsy Luang Phinith|Didier Kaminka|Mathieu|Despina Ricci|Marie Zidi|Lucie Wargnier|Stanislas Bonafe|Salvatore Ingoglia|Andrée Damant|Michel B. Dupérial|Christian Gion|Julien Zidi|Julie Parnet|François Borysse|Jean-Claude Bolle-Reddat|Philippe Soutan|Bonnafet Tarbouriech|Michel Danjou|Jean Pommier|Raymond Gil|Isabelle Petit Brisson|Arno Balenci|Marc Hoang|Jean-Claude Valade|Christian Gazio|Jean-Philippe Batailley|Gabriel Chantrieux|Cyril Duflot|Philippe Bussignies|Jean-Louis Magueres|Pascal Madura|Stéphane Bourquin|Patrice Cossonneau|Lionel Ovadia|Alain Connan|Christophe Corbel|Jean Miel|Eric Moreau
title: Ripoux 3
